topic.title: Connect on the HP Cloud Community Forum

body.p: Join the conversation! Connect with HP Cloud OS specialists and other users in discussions about HP Cloud OS, OpenStack(R) and related solutions.

p.xref: Join us on the HP Cloud Community Forum

body.p: Tip: To actively participate in the forum, you must register on the site, if you have not already done so. Be sure to use the promo code HP Cloud OS when registering.
In the forum, ask your questions or read previous discussions on a range of cloud computing topics. See you there...
